suite.name: Network Checkout

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a new SSH connection to the given ``host`` and ``port``.

kw.name: Login
kw.doc: Logs into the SSH server with the given ``username`` and ``password``.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.
kw.msg: ${output} = Peer: 101.234.3.101 AS 9255 Local: 101.234.3.1 AS 9255 Group: RR-PEER Routing-Instance: master Forwarding routing-instance: master Type: Internal State: Active Fla...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: NAT Public IP
kw.doc: Check If Tranlated Public IP address is in the VRF route-table.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.
kw.msg:
${output} = l3vpn-service-39.inet.0: 5 destinations, 5 routes (5 active, 0 holddown, 0 hidden) + = Active Route, - = Last Active, * = Both
101.234.59.59/32 *[Static/1] 00:33:22 Service t...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: NAT Ping from CE
kw.doc: Ping from CE side to Remote CE IP address.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.
kw.msg:
${output} = PING 172.162.39.2 (172.162.39.2): 56 data bytes 64 bytes from 172.162.39.2: icmp_seq=0 ttl=62 time=2.910 ms 64 bytes from 172.162.39.2: icmp_seq=1 ttl=62 time=1.591 ms
--- 172.162.39.2 ping statistic...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: NAT Session Validation
kw.doc: Validating NAT session of ICMP sent From Local CE.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.

arguments.arg: show services sessions service-set MS-OFFICE-SERVICE-SET-59 extensive

kw.msg: Executing command 'show services sessions service-set MS-OFFICE-SERVICE-SET-59 extensive'.

${output} = ms-3/2/0 Service Set: MS-OFFICE-SERVICE-SET-59, Session: 335544324, ALG: icmp, Flags: 0x80000, IP Action: no, Offload: no, Asymmetric: no NAT PLugin Data: NAT Action: Translation Type - NAPT-44 ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

suite.doc: Start Service Validation in SQL lab.
